intro.title: Discover the Essence of Tea and Coffee
intro.description: At Flor de Té, we bring you organic and sustainable blends to brighten your day. Discover our unique selection of teas and coffees crafted with passion and care.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.description: Get exclusive offers, news, and discounts. Don’t miss out!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is simple: to provide an unparalleled experience in every cup. At FLOR DE TÉ, we believe tea and coffee are more than just beverages; they are moments of connection, inspiration, and calm. We strive to enrich your daily rituals with authentic, flavorful products crafted with dedication. By prioritizing quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction, we aim to become your trusted ally in exploring the wonderful world of tea and coffee.

values.title: Values
values.description: At Flor De Té, we believe tea and coffee are more than just beverages: they are experiences that connect, inspire, and elevate everyday moments. Every bean and leaf we offer reflects our dedication to excellence, innovation, sustainability, customer care, and quality. These values guide everything we do, ensuring each cup is a testament to our passion for perfection.

1.title: Commitment
1.description: We are dedicated to offering the best in every aspect of our store, from product selection to customer service. Our commitment extends to producer communities, ensuring fair and responsible practices.

2.title: Innovation
2.description: We constantly seek new ways to surprise our customers, blending tradition with creativity. We experiment with flavors, techniques, and presentations to create unique and memorable experiences.

3.title: Customer Care
3.description: The customer is at the center of everything we do. We offer warm, personalized attention, ensuring every visit to our store is special and satisfying.

4.title: Quality
4.description: Every product we offer is carefully selected to ensure freshness, flavor, and excellence. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards in every cup of tea or coffee that reaches our customers.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: At Flor De Té, we aspire to be a reference in creating unique experiences around tea and coffee, offering the highest quality products that connect people with authentic flavors from around the world. Our vision is to build a community passionate about tea and coffee, where tradition and innovation meet to inspire unforgettable moments. We are committed to leading with sustainability, respect for the environment, and support for small producers, elevating each cup to an expression of art and dedication.
